TopicTitle: Probe claims it has three crew when it blows up?

Articles.Content:
So, the title. I'm attempting to make a probe core. It has the

MODULE

{

name = ModuleCommand

minimumCrew = 0

}

field set, but when it blows up it kills three Kerbals. Considering this thing is the size of a soda can, this is really unlikely. Help?
You need to set CrewCapacity = 0 within the main PART {} definition.
